title: I deeply mourned the loss of the Oleander Eddie Romanelli\'s when it was replaced with the horrendous FlatEddie\'s a while back. I live just two blocks from there and was a constant Romanelli\'s patron. Not so much with FlatEddie\'s. In the past week or so there has been a lot of activity in and around the location. What is coming there? Please let it be another great restauraunt. (Maybe this one won\'t get killed by its owners)
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=15678
